subject: Delivered
description_text: Hello Do you send parcels to Poland? I can't find it on the list, so I can't buy it, even though the phone number is immediately the Polish flag

conversations.body_text: Hi Patryk. misiak,     This is our Polish agent's website where you can make purchases.  https://fmic.pl/elektronika/simracing?product_brand=Simsonn

How does it work that in Poland it is much more expensive than in your official store? The difference is almost $200


>
Hi Patryk. misiak,    This is the dealer's pricing, which we cannot determine.  I have temporarily enabled your access to purchase on the official website. You may proceed with your purchase there.
